mapper.insert: insert into plate (id, sec_name, sec_url, sec_sort, sec_parent_id, sec_pic, sec_type, sec_del_state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secDelState,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update plate set sec_name = #{secName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sec_url = #{secUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sec_sort = #{secSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sec_parent_id = #{secParentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sec_pic = #{secPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sec_type = #{secType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sec_del_state = #{secDelState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, sec_name, sec_url, sec_sort, sec_parent_id, sec_pic, sec_type, sec_del_state from plate
